text: Juan Malo (11 February 1922 - 8 October 2005) was a Spanish sports shooter. He competed in the trap event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Spanish male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Spain Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ribagorza
title: Juan Malo
